mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from cinema
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into cinema (create_time, update_time, address, cinema_service, info, db_name, picture, rate, tel, transport, area_id, rate_count, province_id, city_id) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cinemaService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
